Important: Our city location coronavirus reports are separate from the country reports seen in the main table on the coronavirus page Link: /coronavirus/ .

Sometimes it's very hard to find town/city based cases, as governments usually report on a country or regional basis, and not specifying smaller town cases.

About 50% of the city/town data comes from official government sources, and about 50% comes from trusted news article publications submitted by our team or by our users.

Please note that although we try to get as many cases reported on our cities page, we might sometimes miss some cases for certain locations.

If you know any case, please submit a report on the "city" page after you search, with a link to an official news article or government announcement.

OFFICIAL REPORT by Public Health Agency Canada

The cases below were compiled directly from Public Health Agency Canada. We try to get the data on a daily basis as they release it, to make sure we keep you as up-to-date as possible. In rare cases, this data can be a few days behind.

[Source Link: https://www.canada.ca/en/public-health/services/diseases/coronavirus-disease-covid-19.html ]

28 confirmed coronavirus cases in Maroua

Maroua , CM

These are not factual. We are getting reports of 28 cases and 4 dead as of today. May 19,2020. As there is NO testing until just last week, there could be thousands of cases not reported. Plus many people are traveling for Ramadan to and from norther Nigeria where there are hundreds dead from corona. As you can read from the link provided there is little to NO testing. I have sent a local employee to the two main hospitals every week since March asking about test kits. and proceedures. There are none.

1 confirmed coronavirus cases in Madanapalle

Madanapalle , IN

Madanapalle town in the district registered its first COVID-19 positive case and Chittoor city its second on Thursday. The Chittoor police declared the Lalu Gardens locality of the town as red zone. According to officials, the patient is a resident of Krishna Puram village of neighbouring Gudipala mandal. He visited his business associate in recent days and remained in Chittoor due to the lockdown. It was found that he had been to the Koyambedu Market in Chennai last month. He was shifted to the COVID hospital. The COVID-19 task force officials rushed to the locality and shifted an associate of the patient to a quarantine facility in Chittoor. Last week, an Ambur resident who used to frequent Chittoor to see his wife tested positive to the virus.

VERIFIED SOURCE

1 dead coronavirus cases in Cugir

Cugir , RO

COVID-19 was the first victim in Cugir. It is about a 63-year-old man who also suffered from other ailments. COVID-19 was the first victim in Cugir. It is about a 63-year-old man, who died yesterday, May 7, 2020, at the Municipal Hospital in Blaj. It is the death number 14 registered, since the beginning of the pandemic, in Alba county. He also suffered from other comorbidities: Hypertension and Chronic Viral Hepatitis - Type B.
